title: Sunday in Melbourne
creator_credit: Melbourne Repertory Film Unit, State Film Centre of Victoria, Gil Brealey and Paul Olson
brief_description: An experiment in the creative use of colour visuals, natural sound and dialogue commentary, this film shows the loneliness of the aimless wanderers in the city streets contrasted with those who have companionship on their Sunday. (Award: Special Award for an Experimental Film in the Australian Film Awards, Melbourne Film Festival, 1958) Rights held by Gil Brealey.
